explains: v. （月亮）亏缺；（尤指状况、感觉）衰落，减少（wane 的现在分词）
adj. （月亮）渐亏的；逐渐减弱或变小的
wordGroup: on the wane 逐渐衰落

sentences.en: Moreover, the protesters are unlikely to go away, their confidence is growing rather than waning, their agendas are merging, the protests are spreading and drawing in all ages and concerns.
sentences.cn: 此外，抗议者不太可能离开，他们的信心正在增强而不是减弱，他们的议程正在合并，抗议活动正在蔓延，并吸引了各个年龄段的人和各方关注。

sentences.en: Her popularity clearly shows no sign of waning.
sentences.cn: 她的受欢迎程度显然没有显示出下降的迹象。

sentences.en: Her enthusiasm for the whole idea was waning rapidly.
sentences.cn: 她对整个想法的热情迅速冷淡了下来。
